sections.heading: Prohibition8-531.01.ProhibitionNotwithstanding any other provision of this chapter, no child who in good faith is being furnished Christian Science treatment by a duly accredited practitioner shall, for that reason alone, be considered to be an abused, neglected or dependent child
sections.text: Prohibition8-531.01.ProhibitionNotwithstanding any other provision of this chapter, no child who in good faith is being furnished Christian Science treatment by a duly accredited practitioner shall, for that reason alone, be considered to be an abused, neglected or dependent child.
